Package android.support.v7.internal.widget

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActivityChooserModel.ActivityChooserModelClient
    Client that utilizes an ActivityChooserModel.
    ActivityChooserModel.ActivitySorter
    Defines a sorter that is responsible for sorting the activities based on the provided historical choices and an intent.
    ActivityChooserModel.OnChooseActivityListener
    Listener for choosing an activity.
    NativeActionModeAwareLayout.OnActionModeForChildListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionBarContainer
    This class acts as a container for the action bar view and action mode context views.
    ActionBarContextView  
    ActionBarOverlayLayout
    Special layout for the containing of an overlay action bar (and its content) to correctly handle fitting system windows when the content has request that its layout ignore them.
    ActionBarView  
    ActivityChooserModel
    This class represents a data model for choosing a component for handing a given Intent.
    ActivityChooserModel.HistoricalRecord
    Represents a record in the history.
    ActivityChooserView
    This class is a view for choosing an activity for handling a given Intent.
    CompatTextView  
    LinearLayoutICS  
    ListPopupWindow
    A ListPopupWindow anchors itself to a host view and displays a list of choices.
    NativeActionModeAwareLayout  
    ProgressBarICS  
    ScrollingTabContainerView
    This widget implements the dynamic action bar tab behavior that can change across different configurations or circumstances.
    ScrollingTabContainerView.TabView
